text: Harold and Maude is a 1971 American romantic black comedy movie directed by Hal Ashby and starring Bud Cort, Ruth Gordon, Vivian Pickles, Eric Christmas, Tom Skerritt, Cyril Cusack and Charles Tyner. It was distributed by Paramount Pictures and became a cult classic. In 1997, the Library of Congress selected Harold and Maude into the United States National Film Registry. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1971 romantic comedy movies Category:1970s black comedy movies Category:American black comedy movies Category:American romantic comedy movies Category:Movies directed by Hal Ashby Category:Paramount Pictures movies Category:Cult movies Category:Movies about suicide Category:Movies set in San Francisco Category:Movies about old age Category:1970s English-language movies Category:1970s American drama movies Category:1971 comedy-drama movies Category:American comedy-drama movies Category:Movies set in country houses Category:United States National Film Registry movies Category:1971 romantic drama movies Category:American romantic drama movies
title: Harold and Maude
